subject: Hockey, Ice
Olympic Games (2014)
lead_paragraph: The I.O.C. asked Noora Raty, the star goalie of Finland’s women’s hockey team, to cover a patriotic slogan on the back of her goalie mask.
snippet: The I.O.C. asked Noora Raty, the star goalie of Finland’s women’s hockey team, to cover a patriotic slogan on the back of her goalie mask.
